user.title: Select Cosori Kettle
user.description: Select your Cosori Kettle from the list of discovered devices.

pair_device.title: Pair New Device
pair_device.description: Press and hold the MyBrew button on your kettle to enter pairing mode, then click Submit to pair. A new registration key will be generated automatically.

enter_key.title: Enter Registration Key
enter_key.description: Enter the 32-character hexadecimal registration key for {name}.

error.device_not_in_pairing_mode: Device is not in pairing mode. Press and hold the MyBrew button on the kettle and try again.
error.pairing_failed: Failed to pair with device. Please try again.
error.invalid_key: Registration key was rejected by device. Check the key and try again.
error.invalid_key_length: Registration key must be exactly 32 hexadecimal characters.
error.invalid_key_format: Invalid registration key format. Use only 0-9, A-F.
error.connection_failed: Failed to connect. Ensure device is nearby and try again.

abort.not_supported: This device is not a Cosori Kettle
